adverbs.description: mesmerically (comparative more mesmerically, superlative most mesmerically)

entries.meaning: In a mesmeric manner; by, or as if by, hypnotism.
examples: "What do you want me to do?" she asked, in her nervousness holding the bowl of her glass — it was a large glass on a stem, that the Mexicans call a Copa, a Cup — and swaying the wine mesmerically.
